plot: An adult film actress is lured into performing in S&M scenes. When she discovers she enjoys it, she begins to find difficulty distinguishing her real life from her acting life.
title: Sex joyû zankokushi
plot_es: An adult film actress is lured into performing in S&M scenes. When she discovers she enjoys it, she begins to find difficulty distinguishing her real life from her acting life.
plot_en: An adult film actress is lured into performing in S&M scenes. When she discovers she enjoys it, she begins to find difficulty distinguishing her real life from her acting life.
